ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( Advice_Status__c, "Deck complete" )
,
OR(
NOT( ISPICKVAL( Full_Fact_Find_Status__c, "Complete"))
,
ISBLANK(Suitability_checklist__c) ,
LOA_s_Completed__c = FALSE
,
ISPICKVAL( New_LOAs_required__c, "No")
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Suitability checklist is blank, Fact find is not complete, LOAs are not complete or New LOAs required
